fullText: This gorgeous spectacle about love and survival during the Great Depression is one of the most visually stunning shows to hit Broadway in years.
dtliExcerpt: This gorgeous spectacle about love and survival during the Great Depression is one of the most visually stunning shows to hit Broadway in years.

keyPhrases.quote: one of the most visually stunning shows to hit Broadway in years
gorgeous spectacle about love and survival

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Strong praise with superlatives about visual impact places this in the clear positive recommendation range despite the brief excerpt. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses strong enthusiasm for the visual aspects of the production, indicating it is a must-see experience.

bwwExcerpt: “Water” has more exuberance than wit; more catchphrases than character. While the second half lumbers along like a pre-flight Dumbo, the wrong scenes and songs are given too much breathing room and important events such as, you know, murders and catastrophic stampedes are raced through to curtain call. Although “Water” is a love story, that becomes one of its less appealing aspects.
